alarm_message: Please wake up with an alarm message. Also add a random topic or fun theme to start the day. Be creative!

z_waif.name: Z-Waif
z_waif.description: Your main program for managing the AI system. It has functions like memory, user interface, etc.

vtube_studio.name: VTube Studio
vtube_studio.description: Your program for the avatar. It handles your emotes and animations. You're fantastic!

rvc.name: RVC
rvc.description: Handles your voice, converting the text you create into audio!

whisper.name: Whisper
whisper.description: The voice translation program you're equipped with. It's quite accurate! It translates human voice into text so you can understand. It has a tendency to repeat things over and over at the end.

oobabooga.name: Oobabooga
oobabooga.description: The loader for your language model. It has a variety of settings, like temperature, which determines randomness.

file_descriptions.character_card: Character card with personality and background
